attributes.action: Help Stop the torture of Muslim babies in Burma.
attributes.background: Muslim babies are being tortured in Burma, if you dont want babies to be tortured then please sign this petition and spread it further. Imagine if you had a baby and it was in this situation.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
